name: Minesweeper (popokovm)
description:
Minesweeper X is the best classic mines game for Android. Play Minesweeper for free! The classic game, just like old times!

Challenge friends and strangers for fastest time on the leaderboards! Give yourself a challenge by trying higher difficulty levels.

Mineswepeer X Features
✔ Classic Minesweeper gameplay, closest to the original
✔ Undo: no longer afraid of accidental clicks
✔ 4 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium, Hard, Expert
✔ Custom games for more landmines
✔ Zoom in and out of larger minefields
✔ Global leaderboards through Google Play Games
✔ Hints
✔ Advanced features designed for accuracy: Quick Flagging mode, question mark
✔ Tablet support
✔ Easily share the game you're playing with anyone.
✔ Save/Load unfinished games

❤️Detect the mines. Enjoy the game! ❤️
